notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: Administrative authorisation was provided by the Directorate General of the Chantal BIYA International Reference for research on HIV/AIDS prevention and management (CIRCB), under the reference number 0191/019/CIRCB/DG/SAA/BRH. Ethical clearance was obtained from the National Ethics Committee for Research on Human Health (reference number 2019/06/34/CE/CNERSH/SP of June 14, 2019). Written informed consent was provided.
